flavorText:
"The path up the cliffs is nothing but steep switchbacks and rickety lifts, made by elves, maintained by humans, and guarded by ogres. But it's the best way into the heart of Murasa."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

foreignData.flavorText:
„Der Weg die Klippen hinauf besteht aus nichts als steilen Serpentinen und klapprigen Aufzügen, die von Elfen gebaut, von Menschen in Stand gehalten und von Ogern bewacht werden. Aber es ist der einfachste Weg ins Herz von Murasa."
—Samila aus Murasas Expeditionsgildenhaus
foreignData.name: Kazuuls Zorn // Kazuuls Klippen
foreignData.text:
Kazuuls Klippen kommen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {R}.
Spontanzauber
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
"El camino hacia los precipicios consiste en curvas escarpadas y subidas tambaleantes que levantaron los elfos, mantuvieron los humanos y vigilaron los ogros. Pero es la mejor ruta para ir al centro de Murasa".
—Samila, Casa expedicionaria de Murasa
foreignData.name: Furia de Kazuul // Precipicios de Kazuul
foreignData.text:
Los Precipicios de Kazuul entran al campo de batalla girados.
{T}: Agrega {R}.
Instantáneo
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
« La route du sommet des falaises est faite de chemins sinueux et de remontées bancales construits par des elfes, entretenus par des humains et gardés par des ogres. Mais c'est le meilleur chemin pour pénétrer au cœur de Murasa. »
—Samila, corps expéditionnaire de Murasa
foreignData.name: Fureur de Kazuul // Falaises de Kazuul
foreignData.text:
Les Falaises de Kazuul arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées.
{T} : Ajoutez {R}.
Éphémère
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
"Il sentiero che sale tra le rupi non è altro che una serie di ripidi tornanti e passaggi instabili costruiti dagli elfi, conservati dagli umani e custoditi dagli ogre. Ma è il cammino migliore per raggiungere il cuore di Murasa."
—Samila, Casa di Spedizioni di Murasa
foreignData.name: Furia di Kazuul // Rupi di Kazuul
foreignData.text:
Le Rupi di Kazuul entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate.
{T}: Aggiungi {R}.
Istantaneo
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
「崖を上る道は厳しいなんてもんじゃないわ。ジグザグ道にグラグラの張り出し。エルフが作って、人間が整備して、オーガが見張っている。でも、ムラーサの中心まで行くにはこの道が一番なのよ。」
――ムラーサ探検協会のサミーラ
foreignData.name: カズールの憤怒 // カズールの崖
foreignData.text:
カズールの崖はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{R}を加える。
インスタント
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
"절벽을 오르는 길은 엘프들이 만들고, 인간이 유지하며, 오우거가 지키고 있는 가파른 경사로와 삐걱거리는 승강기에 불과해. 하지만 이게 무라사의 심장부로 들어가는 최선의 길이야."
—무라사 탐험단의 사밀라
foreignData.name: 카줄의 분노 // 카줄의 절벽
foreignData.text:
카줄의 절벽은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R}를 추가한다.
순간마법
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
"O caminho até os penhascos não passa de uma estradinha íngreme e tortuosa e de teleféricos instáveis feitos por elfos, mantidos por humanos e protegidos por ogros. Mas é o melhor caminho até o coração de Murasa."
— Samila, Casa Expedicionária de Murasa
foreignData.name: Fúria de Kazuul // Penhascos de Kazuul
foreignData.text:
Penhascos de Kazuul entra no campo de batalha virado.
{T}: Adicione {R}.
Mágica Instantânea
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
«Путь через утесы — это крутые подъемы и спуски и шаткие лифты, которые сделали эльфы, чинили люди и охраняют огры. Но это лучшая дорога в сердце Мурасы».
— Самила из Мурасского экспедиционного дома
foreignData.name: Ярость Казуула // Утесы Казуула
foreignData.text:
Утесы Казуула выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
{T}: добавьте {R}.
Мгновенное заклинание
{2}{R}

foreignData.flavorText:
「这条山崖通路由妖精建造、人类维护、食人魔看守。虽然不过是一条陡峭迂回，崎岖不平的便道，但却是进入姆拉撒中心地带的最佳路线。」
～姆拉撒探险队的莎米勒
foreignData.name: 克卒怒火 // 克卒山崖
foreignData.text:
克卒山崖须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}。

foreignData.flavorText:
「這條山崖通路由妖精建造、人類維護、食人魔看守。雖然不過是一條陡峭迂迴，崎嶇不平的便道，但卻是進入姆拉撒中心地帶的最佳路線。」
～姆拉撒探險隊的莎米勒

rulings.text: There is a single triangle icon in the top left corner of the front face. There is a double triangle icon in the top left corner of the back face.
To determine whether it is legal to play a modal double-faced card, consider only the characteristics of the face you’re playing and ignore the other face’s characteristics.

If an effect allows you to play a specific modal double-faced card, you may cast it as a spell or play it as a land, as determined by which face you choose to play. If an effect allows you to cast (rather than “play”) a specific modal double-faced card, you can’t play it as a land.
If an effect allows you to play a land or cast a spell from among a group of cards, you may play or cast a modal double-faced card with any face that fits the criteria of that effect.

The converted mana cost of a modal double-faced card is based on the characteristics of the face that’s being considered. On the stack and battlefield, consider whichever face is up. In all other zones, consider only the front face. This is different than how the converted mana cost of a transforming double-faced card is determined.

A modal double-faced card can’t be transformed or be put onto the battlefield transformed. Ignore any instruction to transform a modal double-faced card or to put one onto the battlefield transformed.
If an effect puts a double-faced card onto the battlefield, it enters with its front face up. If that front face can’t be put onto the battlefield, it doesn’t enter the battlefield.

If an effect instructs a player to choose a card name, the name of either face may be chosen. If that effect or a linked ability refers to a spell with the chosen name being cast and/or a land with the chosen name being played, it considers only the chosen name, not the other face’s name.

In the Commander variant, a double-faced card’s color identity is determined by the mana costs and mana symbols in the rules text of both faces combined. If either face has a color indicator or basic land type, those are also considered.
